name: Mini Jam 68 - Don't Sleep
description:
Tihs is our game with my friend Tiredboi (he mades the sound effects) for the Mini Jam 68. 

Its name is Don't Sleep cause you play a student who must work and learn as much as he can.

  • He must read books and use scroll bar
  • He need to highlight importants quotes
  • He has to watch a presentation and click the faster he can

Use ZQSD to move, E to interact with objects and use the mouse in mini-games

PS : You can find Tiredboi's work here : https://soundcloud.com/user-997450757
